mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.state FROM check_work_leave a WHERE a.id = #{leaveId}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.odd_number oddNumber, IFNULL(a.process_instance_id,'') processInstanceId, a.state, a.remark, IFNULL(a.enclosure_info, '') enclosureInfo, CASE a.state WHEN '0' THEN '草稿' WHEN '1' THEN '审核中' WHEN '2' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '3' THEN '审核不通过' WHEN '4' THEN '作废' WHEN '5' THEN '撤销' END stateName, b.user_name userName, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime FROM check_work_leave a, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.id = #{leaveId} AND a.create_id = b.user_id

SELECT b.title timeName, b.rest_start_time restStartTime, b.rest_end_time restEndTime, a.id, a.time_start_time timeStartTime, a.time_end_time timeEndTime, a.leave_type leaveType, a.leave_type_name leaveTypeName, a.leave_day leaveDay, a.leave_start_time leaveStartTime, a.leave_end_time leaveEndTime, a.leave_hour leaveHour, a.state, CASE a.state WHEN '0' THEN '未提交审批' WHEN '1' THEN '等待审批' WHEN '2' THEN '审批通过' WHEN '3' THEN '审批不通过' END stateName, a.remark FROM check_work_leave_time_slot a LEFT JOIN check_work_time b ON a.time_id = b.id WHERE a.leave_id = #{leaveId}
mapper.insert: INSERT into check_work_leave (id, title, odd_number, state, process_instance_id, remark, enclosure_info, create_id, create_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{oddNumber}, #{state}, #{processInstanceId}, #{remark}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{createId}, #{createTime})

insert into check_work_leave_time_slot (id, leave_id, time_id, leave_type, leave_type_name, leave_day, leave_start_time, leave_end_time, leave_hour, state, remark, time_start_time, time_end_time) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.leaveId}, #{item.timeId}, #{item.leaveType}, #{item.leaveTypeName}, #{item.leaveDay}, #{item.leaveStartTime}, #{item.leaveEndTime}, #{item.leaveHour}, '0', #{item.remark}, #{item.timeStartTime}, #{item.timeEndTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.odd_number oddNumber, IFNULL(a.process_instance_id, '') processInstanceId, a.state, a.remark, IFNULL(a.enclosure_info, '') enclosureInfo, b.user_name userName FROM check_work_leave a, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.id = #{leaveId} AND a.create_id = b.user_id

SELECT a.time_id timeId, a.time_start_time timeStartTime, a.time_end_time timeEndTime, a.leave_type leaveType, a.leave_day leaveDay, a.leave_start_time leaveStartTime, a.leave_end_time leaveEndTime, a.leave_hour leaveHour, a.remark FROM check_work_leave_time_slot a WHERE a.leave_id = #{leaveId}
